page.title: 10 A SUNDAY AT HOME
page.content: I usually get up at 7.00 a.m. My bed is a single bed, I have a duvet with plants on it. I go downstairs and have a bowl of cornflakes. I watch T.V.a.m. It is a programme with guests on it. After that I go to church with my two brothers, David and Tony. Church is Catholic, we have to help the Father. I do the incense while my brothers do the candles. At 11.00 a.m. church is over so I go to my gran's while my brothers get the paper. At 12.00 a.m. I go home and have my dinner. We have meat, vegetables, potatoes, Yorkshire Pudding and gravy. For desert we have Apple Crumble. At 1.00 p.m. I watch Battle Star Galactica. It is about two men who try to save earth from aliens. After dinner I tidy my room. At 5.00 p.m. I have my tea. I have salad which is lettuce, tomatoes and cheese.
